item.title: 數據結構
item.description: Doubly Linked List 什麼是雙向鏈表 雙向鏈表是一種特殊的鏈表，其中的每個節點都包含前一個和後一個節點的引用。 下面是一個雙向鏈表的簡單示例： 1// Class for Doubly Linked List 2public class DLL { 3 // Head of list 4 Node head; 5 // Doubly Linked list Node 6 class Node { 7 int data; 8 Node prev; 9 Node next; 10 // Constructor to create a new node 11 // next and prev is by default initialized as null 12 Node(int d) { data = d; } 13 } 14} 1# Node of a doubly linked list 2class Node: 3 def __init__(self, next=None, prev=None, data=None): 4 # reference to next node in DLL 5 self.
